content.rendered:
Serving the Chicago Area

ORIGINAL Chicago TV Installer

Support local Business • Since 2005 • Best reviews • Lifetime Warranty • from $67

We are your go-to people for TV installations, home theaters, network wiring and more in the Chicago area.
Our goal is to set you up with the best entertainment systems possible. Do it once and enjoy a lifetime of peace of mind.

773-413-0088
773-413-0088

TV installation

We offer both tabletop and wall TV installation services. We can also repair TVs and fix connection and wiring issues.

Network and Cable Wiring

We can help you set up and wire TVs and other cables, even if they are inside of existing drywall surfaces.

Smart configurations

We can install smart homes, universal remotes, projectors, security cameras and sound systems in your home.

Home Theater

We offer complete wiring and installation of home theater equipment, certification and calibration.

"Do it once, and enjoy lifetime peace of mind"

-Chicago TV Installer

Chicago TV Installer
4.5
Based on 159 Reviews

// ABOUT US

How We Work

We are a friendly and local company with over 25 years of experience. We offer a lifetime warranty on our services and installations. Get in touch with us today to learn more about our company, pricing, or any of our services.

Overview of Services

From TV installations and repairs, to network wiring and creating home theaters, we have a variety of services that are all meant to improve your at-home entertainment life.

  • Wall TV Installation
  • Tabletop TV Installation
  • TV Repair
  • Home Theater
  • Universal Remote
  • Network Wiring
  • Security Camera
  • Smart Home
  • Projector Installation
Our Reviews

Testimonials

What our clients say.

I had purchased a TV at Best Buy and the Geek Squad was booked out several weeks for installs. I found Chicago TV Installer from a Google search and not only did they have great availability, their prices were better than Geek Squad as well.   They showed up right on time (they even waited for us a bit since we were out finishing lunch - thanks so much) and completed the install efficiently and professionally. The mount they supplied was exactly what we were looking for.   No need to call Geek Squad - these are your guys!
William B.Chicago, IL. 5 Stars.
Borris was super prompt! The TV was up and mounted in less than 20 min. I really appreciate how friendly he was but how he also ensured the placement was correct before installing!  Thank you so much Borris!
Amanda M.Chicago, IL. 5 Stars.
Had 2 TVs + sound bar installed today and everything looks great. 2 guys arrived and they worked quickly. Everything was done within an hour. He asked me my opinion on a couple things which I appreciated and they cleaned up after.
Stuart T.5 Stars.
Simply the best service, exceptional communication, fair pricing, and outstanding attention to detail. I would give them more than 5 stars if I could. They mounted a 60-inch television over a fireplace for us. I appreciate the calls letting us know when to expect them.
Dick L.Chicago, IL. 5 Stars.
Previous
Next

Contact us today.

Get in touch with us to schedule an appointment, learn more about our company, services and pricing, or to get a free quote.

Call Us!

(773)-413-0088​

Email us!

chicagotvinstaller@gmail.com

Servicing the Greater

Chicago, Illinois Areas
